title: Claudia Collarin
text:
Postdoctoral Associate
Ca‚Äô Foscari University of Venice





I am a postdoctoral associate in the Department of Environmental Sciences, Informatics and Statistics at Ca‚Äô Foscari University of Venice, working with Ilaria Prosdocimi. I received my PhD in Statistics at the Universiy of Padova in 2025, under the supervision of Bruno Scarpa and Matteo Fasiolo.
I am interested in developing flexible regression models for the analysis of complex data, with a focus on both theoretical and computational aspects. My recent work involves Generalized Additive Models (GAMs), distributional regression, and applications to environmental data.
Outside statistics, I love hiking and climbing, particularly in my home mountains: the Dolomites.
 See my full CV.





Generalized Additive Models
